name: GitLab (npx)
description: Manage GitLab repositories, issues, merge requests, pipelines, wikis, milestones, and releases. 107+ tools with configurable toolsets, read-only mode, and project scoping.

inputs.label: GitLab Personal Access Token
inputs.description: Personal Access Token for the GitLab API. Requires 'api' scope for full access, or 'read_api' for read-only mode.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to GitLab > User Settings > Access Tokens
2. Click 'Add new token'
3. Select the 'api' scope (or 'read_api' for read-only)
4. Click 'Create personal access token' and copy it

inputs.label: GitLab API URL
inputs.description: GitLab API base URL. Defaults to https://gitlab.com/api/v4 for gitlab.com. Change for self-hosted instances.

auth.instructions: Create a Personal Access Token with 'api' scope at https://gitlab.com/-/user_settings/personal_access_tokens
